tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: AnotherSocialEconomy.com. Report issues at: support@anothersocialeconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: ezToff.com. Report issues at: support@ezToff.com. ezToff.com is a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short pre-formatted commands

tuv.seg: |--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
demand qty:X due-date:X tags:X

demand demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate} locale:{demand>location>postalCode} {demand>location>countryCode} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata}
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>criteria} metadata:{demand>metadata}
propose proposal:{proposal>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>criteria} metadata:{demand>metadata}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

tu.note: Message informing CC'ed users about the demand creation.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>location>*}: demand's location attributes {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg: FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}.

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for demand:{demand>key} | The store:{store>key} {store>name} will be asked to mark and hold demand:{demand>key}.
:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for tee-off Demand:{demand>key} | The golf course {store>name} will be asked to reserve the tee-off time {demand>dueDate}.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
{store>name} has reserved Proposal# {proposal>key}, due {proposal>dueDate}.
Thank you for the confirmation & enjoy your purchase!
FYI. After closing your transaction at the Store, you should return here to close your Demand. Not only will you improve your Closing Rate, you'll also be given the opportunity to later review the Store and/or Sales Associate.
More store information:
Address: {store>address}
Telephone: {store>phoneNb}
Store registered by YellowPages.ca
If for any reason, you're no longer interested in this demand, you can send an email by clicking cancel, or, if you've received this message in error, click There's been some kind of mistake :-(
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

tu.note: Message informing the cc'ed about a proposal confirmation.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {store>*}: store attributes {store>location>*}: store location attributes {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

Message informing the cc'ed about a proposal confirmation.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {store>*}: store attributes {store>location>*}: store location attributes {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} for Demand:{demand>key} has been confirmed.| Please mark, hold for Consumer with Demand:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} on {proposal>dueDate} has been confirmed.| Please mark, schedule the tee-off Demand:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

tu.note: Message confirming the demand closing.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {demand>owner>name}, Thanks for closing demand:{demand>key} - which will be reflected in your AnotherSocialEconomy.com Rating shortly.

tu.note: Message confirming the demand closing.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg:
Hi {demand>owner>name},
Thank you for closing Demand {demand>key}. In return, we'll be updating your Closing Rate shortly. In the meantime, we invite you to share your experience by writing a review with {store>reviewSystem>name}.
We thank you once again for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com and hope you'll recomment us to your friends.
AnotherSocialEconomy.com: Your missing link between shopping online & buying offline. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

tu.note: Message confirming the demand closing.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg:
Hi {demand>owner>name},
Thank you for closing the ezToff Demand {demand>key}. In return, we'll be updating your Closing Rate shortly. In the meantime, we invite you to share your experience by writing a review with {store>reviewSystem>name}.
We thank you once again for reserving your tee-time wth ezToff.com.com and hope you'll recomment us to your friends. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

tuv.seg:
Hi {demand>owner>name},
Your Demand# {demand>key} has been canceled.
If you enjoyed using AnotherSocialEconomy.com, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}.

tu.note: Message confirming the proposal canceling to the sale associate.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tu.note: Message confirming the proposal canceling to the sale associate.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tu.note: Message confirming the proposal canceling to the sale associate.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {demand>owner>name}, the proposal:{proposal>key} you confirmed has been canceled.| Your demand:{demand>key} has been re-broadcasted to stores around. Send "cancel demand:{demand>key}" to stop the process.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
{store>name} has canceled their Proposal# {proposal>key}. As the result, your Demand# {demand>key} has been forwarded to stores in your area.
If for any reason, you're no longer interested in this demand, you can send an email by clicking cancel, or, if you've received this message in error, click There's been some kind of mistake :-(
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.
